title: Is This the Weirdest Script I've Ever Read? - A Quiet Place
author: Think Story
comment: 🍿 Want more Screenwriting Videos? Check out my playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7hcQCA0WMUJLQTCzmg8zcTB 🍿

I remember at the cinema zone at the mall with my family and our choices were this or Avengers: Infinity War. Now, all of us being a fan of the MCU, this was a pretty huge dilemma.

Great video as usual. Definitely worth the wait.
Just subbed, I gaurentee this channel will blow up soon and when it does I’ll be along for the ride
Great vid dan! Informative as always!
Is this the House of Leaves of screenplays?
description:
As part of my job I read hundreds of scripts, but this one stood out  because it breaks almost every screenwriting convention out there... and it does it well!

In this video I break down the Scott Beck and Bryan Woods draft of "A Quiet Place" to see how defying convention can make for a greater reading experience.

Check out my Screenwriting Playlist:
